# API Calls
```{r api.1}
#Franchise Function
franchise <- function(){
  full_url <- "https://records.nhl.com/site/api/franchise"
  get <- GET(url = full_url)
  content <- content(get, as = "text")
  nhl_data <- fromJSON(content, flatten = T)
  data <- nhl_data$data
  return(data)
}

#Get Data
franchise_data <- franchise()
```
